text: trong banhchoul peloyb tow knong pelothngai haey banhchoul pel thngai tow knong peloyb . haey trong b po ch nh robsa rsa pi robsa slab( u. b po ch nh kaunman pi pongmean) haey trong b po ch nh robsa slab pi robsa rsa( u. b po ch nh pongmean pi memean) haey trongbratan leaphosakkar champoh anaknea del trong mean chetnea daoy kmean kamnt laey
